def_cn: 竖起大拇指(表示赞成或满意)
def_en: A thumbs-up or a thumbs-up sign is a sign that you make by raising your thumb to show that you agree with someone, that you are happy with an idea or situation, or that everything is all right.
If you give a plan, idea, or suggestion the thumbs-up, you indicate that you approve of it and are willing to accept it.
